description: Secret footage of a prisoner's brutal torture in 2018 caused a public outcry and calls for reform.
title: Russian court acquits prison bosses in high-profile torture case
title_page: Russian court acquits prison bosses in high-profile torture case - BBC News
maintext: Court sources quoted by Russian media said that Dmitry Nikolaev, former head of the prison IK-1 in Yaroslavl, and his deputy Igit Mikhailov had been cleared on charges of torture. Prosecutors immediately said they would appeal against the verdicts.
